'''Captain Reiki''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Reiki captains the ''Rauatai's Fist'', a vessel that can be encountered before sailing to Ukaizo if the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) is the strongest rival.

## Interactions

|other           =
}}
